pageContent: Introduction: The Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite (EPIC) is a validated and widely adopted instrument that measures patient quality of life. This study aims to describe and compare patient quality of life in the bowel, urinary, and sexual domains across different prostate cancer treatments.

metaData.source:
5-year urinary and sexual outcomes after radical prostatectomy: results from the prostate cancer outcomes study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15821561/
